an3.84:1.1: Ekam samayam bhagava vesaliyam viharati mahavane kutagarasalayam.
an3.84:1.2: Atha kho annataro vajjiputtako bhikkhu yena bhagava tenupasankami; upasankamitva bhagavantam abhivadetva ekamantam nisidi. Ekamantam nisinno kho so vajjiputtako bhikkhu bhagavantam etadavoca:
an3.84:1.5: “Sakkhissasi pana tvam, bhikkhu, tisu sikkhasu sikkhitum—
an3.84:2.1: Yato kho tvam, bhikkhu, adhisilampi sikkhissasi, adhicittampi sikkhissasi, adhipannampi sikkhissasi, tassa tuyham bhikkhu adhisilampi sikkhato adhicittampi sikkhato adhipannampi sikkhato rago pahiyissati, doso pahiyissati, moho pahiyissati.
an3.84:2.2: So tvam ragassa pahana dosassa pahana mohassa pahana yam akusalam na tam karissasi, yam papam na tam sevissasi”ti.
an3.84:3.1: Atha kho so bhikkhu aparena samayena adhisilampi sikkhi, adhicittampi sikkhi, adhipannampi sikkhi.
an3.84:3.2: Tassa adhisilampi sikkhato adhicittampi sikkhato adhipannampi sikkhato rago pahiyi, doso pahiyi, moho pahiyi.
an3.84:3.3: So ragassa pahana dosassa pahana mohassa pahana yam akusalam tam nakasi, yam papam tam na seviti.
